name: Arm and Leg Builder GameOff 2022
description:
My submission for the Game Off 2022 game jam. I made my game around the cliché of "costs an arm and a leg". You play as a robot builder who trades a robot arm and leg in order to get other body parts for the robot you are assembling.

Music by SamPixelz.  I used the music pack 10 8 Bit Music Loops For Free Link:https://sam-spectre.itch.io/10-8-bit-music-loops-for-free
